notes: K2XX Sierra 1500 introduced Denali luxury trim and All Terrain X edition. Features EcoTec3 engine family with direct injection and variable valve timing. Apple CarPlay/Android Auto available from mid-cycle refresh. Data sourced from Wikipedia GMC Sierra article, October 11, 2025 revision.

K2XX Sierra HD received significant Duramax power increase in 2017 (445 hp, 910 lb-ft). Allison 1000 transmission on diesel models requires specific fluid and service procedures. DEF system on diesel models. Data sourced from Wikipedia GMC Sierra article, October 11, 2025 revision.

Fourth-generation Yukon K2XX features aluminum hood and liftgate, magnetic ride control on Denali, active noise cancellation. Received 10-speed automatic transmission on Denali from 2018. Fold-flat second and third-row seats. Data sourced from Wikipedia GMC Yukon article, October 11, 2025 revision.

GMC Savana is rebadged Chevrolet Express, continuing GMT610 platform through 2010s. Available in 1500/2500/3500 configurations with various wheelbases (135"/155"). Diesel option discontinued 2016. Fleet-oriented vehicle. Data sourced from Wikipedia Chevrolet Express article, October 11, 2025 revision.

Second-generation Terrain launched in 2018 with downsized turbocharged engines. 1.6L diesel option available 2018-2019 but discontinued. Replaced first-generation Lambda platform with C1XX platform. Note: Full second-gen coverage in 2020s decade file. Data sourced from Wikipedia GMC Terrain article, October 11, 2025 revision.
